name: Before the Afterlife
description:
Oh no! You got yourself into a car crash and unfortunately, you've passed away. You don't know that though. You don't even know what the cause of death was! The only thing you know is that you’re going through the same room multiple times and that you see a light at the end of the tunnel, and your only focus now is to get to it. 

CONTROLS:

LEFT + RIGHT ARROW KEY - Move left and right

C - Jump

X - Dash

Made in 72 hours for the Indie Tales gamejam

THERE IS A PERFORMANCE ISSUE THAT SLOWLY GETS WORSE THE LONGER YOU PLAY, THIS WILL BE FIXED IN A POST JAM VERSION
